mapper.insert: insert into movie(name, posterUrl, type, country, language, length, startDate, description, status) values(#{name}, #{posterUrl}, #{type}, #{country}, #{language}, #{length}, #{startDate}, #{description}, #{status})
mapper.update: update movie set status = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from movie where startDate <= Now() and status = 0 order by startDate desc
select * from movie where status = 1 order by startDate desc
select * from movie where startDate > Now() and status = 0 order by startDate desc
select * from movie where status = 0 order by startDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into movieLike(userId, movieId, time) values(#{userId}, #{movieId}, Now())
mapper.delete: delete from movieLike where movieId = #{movieId} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from movieLike where movieId = #{movieId} and userId = #{userId}
select count(*) from movieLike where movieId = #{movieId}
select movie.*, count(*) as likeCount from movieLike where movieId = #{movieId} and startDate < Now() and status = 0 order by likeCount desc
select * from movie as m where concat(m.name, m.description, m.type, m.type) like concat('%',#{keyword},'%');
